Name: Attraction
About the game: Attraction is a game about the search for answers. You are a friendly explorer robot, searching for answers in a far away planet. Discovering hidden itens, dialogues and upgrades. Harness the power of the cosmos with your matter gun in this clever and minimalist adventure-puzzle-platformer.
